selection_reasoning: Generation 7 failed to surpass the breakthrough of trial_5_4, largely due to implementation errors in the complex LP/Jacobian logic or timeouts. The selections focus on the best-performing trials (5_4, 5_1) and the technical improvements introduced in Gen 7. The next generation must focus on hard-seeding the 5_4 configuration and applying high-precision numerical refinement with corrected constraint handling.
